org.gatein.api.portal
Interface Navigation

All Superinterfaces:
Iterable<Node>
public interface Navigation
extends Iterable<Node>

Representation of Navigation. It is a tree structure of nodes with associated Pages. Each Navigation has a matching Site.

Author:
Chris Laprun, Boleslaw Dawidowicz
